name: BAMBAMAN vs Them Tonkers~
description:
Made for november one-month gamejam

Options menu:

Try go fullscreenAttempts to set fullscreen mode if supportedUse Antialiasing Enables pixel antialiasing to make smoother edgesPlay sounds & MusicDoes noisesOn Screen ControlsDisplays a on-screen gamepad, for mobileRun cabinet demoFollows the tonkers without playingUplol to leaderbored
Not implemented

Use arrows to move, Space to shoot

Using the on screen controls you can touch the <- left pad and press anywhere on the -> right side of the screen to shoot
